title: Sexual Abuse in Christian Homes and Churches - Collection 14
description:
Sexual Abuse in Christian Homes and Churches - Collection 14:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Barry-Dee & Morris - Online Killers; Portraits of Murderers, Cannibals and Sex Predators Who Stalked theWeb for Their Victims (2006)

-  Bewley - ABC of Domestic Sexual Violence (2014)

-  Bibliography on Sexual and Domestic Violence, FaithTrust Institute (2010)

-  Brandenburg - Confronting Sexual Harassment; What Schools and Colleges Can Do (1997)

-  Bruce & Stewart (Eds.) - College Sex; Philosophy for Everyone; Philosophers with Benefits (2010)

-  Burg - Sodomy and the Pirate Tradition; English Sea Rovers in the 17th-Century Caribbean (1995)

-  Doyle - Clergy Sexual Abuse; Bibliography of Selected Sources (2010)

-  Edger - Losing the Bond with God; Sexual Addiction and Evangelical Men (2011)

-  Finbow - Grave Desire; a Cultural History of Necrophilia (2014)

-  Glatt - Lost and Found; the True Story of Jaycee Lee Dugard and the Abduction That Shocked the World (2010)

-  Goldberg - Communal Discord, Child Abduction, and Rape in the Later Middle Ages (2008)

-  Gunne & Thompson (Eds.) - Feminism, Literature and Rape Narratives; Violence and Violation (2010)

-  Haliczer - Sexuality in the Confessional; a Sacrament Profaned (1996)

-  Hart - Fatal Women; Lesbian Sexuality and the Mark of Aggression (1994)

-  Hazelwood (Ed.) - Wives of Child Molesters within the Family (2015)

-  Hoffer & Shelton - Suicide Among Child Sex Offenders (2013)

-  Johnson - Physical Abusers and Sexual Offenders; Forensic and Clinical Strategies (2007)

-  Jones - Working with Adult Survivors of Child Sexual Abuse (1991)

-  Kilmartin & Berkowitz - Sexual Assault in Context; Teaching College Men About Gender (2005)

-  Kinnear - Childhood Sexual Abuse; a Reference Handbook (1995)

-  McShane - Savile, the Beast; the Inside Story of the Greatest Scandal in TV History (2013)

-  Miles - Boys of the Cloth; the Accidental Role of Church Reforms in Causing and Curbing Abuse by Priests (2012)

-  Prescott - No More Hurt (2011)

-  Robertson - Sex Scandals in the Roman Catholic Church (2005)

-  Robinson - For Christ's Sake; End Sexual Abuse in the Catholic Church... for Good (2013)

-  Sampson - Acts of Abuse; Sex Offenders and the Criminal Justice System (1994)

-  Saunders - Rape and Ravishment in the Literature of Medieval England (2001)

-  Simic - Regulation of Sexual Conduct in UN Peacekeeping Operations (2012)

-  Tormey - Born into the Children of God; My Life in a Religious Sex Cult and My Struggle for Survival on the Outside (2014)

-  Wall - The Callisto Myth from Ovid to Atwood; Initiation and Rape in Literature (1988)

-  Watson - Crying for Help; the Shocking Story of a Damaged Girl with a Dark Past (2012)

-  Watson - The Boy No One Loved; a Heartbreaking True Story of Abuse, Abandonment and Betrayal (2011)

-  Wilcox et al (Eds.) - Sex Offenders Treatment; a Case Study Approach to Issues and Interventions (2015)

-  Wolf - The Nuns of Sant'Ambrogio; the True Story of a Convent Scandal (2013)

-  Wurtele & Miller-Perrin - Preventing Child Sexual Abuse; Sharing the Responsibility (1992)
